amendment.description: To provide additional funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 2292 proposed by Senator Clinton.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2292.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2292 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2292 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 273.
Amendment SA 2292 ruled out of order by the chair.
